 variable input is initialized with 54 according to the input.
It enters a while loop and it checks if the current value of variable input is greater than or equal to the product of 2 and the current value of variable ans.
The condition is met when input is 54, 108, 216, 432, 864, 1728, 3456, 6912, 13824, 27648, 55296, 110592, 221184, 442368, 884736, 1769472, 3538944, 7077888, 14155776, 28311552, 56623104, 113246208, 226492416, 452984832, 905969664, 1811939328, 3623878656, 7247757312, 14495514624, 28991029248, 57982058496, 115964116992, 231928233984, 463856467968, 927712935936, 1855425871872, 3710851743744, 7421703487488, 14843406974976, 29686813949952, 59373627899904, 118747255799808, 237494511599616, 474989023199232, 949978046398464, 1899956092796928, 3799912185593856, 7599824371187712, 15199648742375424, 30399297484750848, 60798594969501696, 121597189939003392, 243194379878006784, 486388759756013568, 972777519512027136, 1945555039024054272, 3891110078048108544, 7782220156096217088, 15564440312192434176, 31128880624384868352, 62257761248769736704, 124515522497539473408, 249031044995078946816, 498062089990157893632, 996124179980315787264, 1992248359960631574528, 3984496719921263149056, 7968993439842526298112, 15937986879685052596224, 31875973759370105192448, 63751947518740210384896, 127503895037480420769792, 255007790074960841539584, 510015580149921683079168, 1020031160299843366158336, 2040062320599686732316672, 4080124641199373464633344, 8160249282398746929266688, 16320498564797493858533376, 32640997129594987717066752, 65281994259189975434133504, 130563988518379950868267008, 261127977036759901736534016, 522255954073519803473068032, 1044511908147039606946136064, 2089023816294079213892272128, 4178047632588158427784544256, 8356095265176316855569088512, 16712190530352633711138177024, 33424381060705267422276354048, 66848762121410534844552708096, 133697524242821069689105416192, 267395048485642139378210832384, 534790096971284278756421664768, 1069580193942568557512843329536, 2139160387885137115025686659072, 4278320775770274230051373318144, 8556641551540548460102746636288, 17113283103081096920205493272576, 34226566206162193840410986545152, 6845313241232438768082197309
